choices: Ross gets to school and meets with his friends
1.content:
Ross couldn't wait, his senior year had finally come. While he noted his highschool experience had been relatively easy going, this year was a whole new era. He was finally a senior, and that meant that for the first time, he and his friends would be the big dogs on top.

When Morning approached, Ross awoke and found that he was actually elated to wake up; he was going to see all his buddies together for the first time since school had ceased for the summer. Summer was always happily welcomed but with everyone's hectic schedules it would be nice to see everyone in one place for once.

The appearance of a new school year also meant the beggining of a new football season, and Ross couldn't wait to be back out on the field feeling the momentum of a hardworking tem unit striving to be the champions.

With all these thoughts buzzing in his head Ross hopped out of bed and began to get ready for school. He got into the shower and got dressed relatively quick, he had never been much of a morning guy but all of the new school year buzz had him energized and ready to go, there was only one problem. You see, as Ross had figured out from a young age, he had more than an...ample butt. He noticed early on that his butt was alot more larger in width and girth in general than any other guys in school. As highschool came into play he earned the name BB from some of the gossiping girls in short for big booty. Things only became more apparent when he started to become more active with sports.

Football tights left no imagination to the mind when it came to his butt, baseball slacks only further accentuated the shape and volume of it, and wrestling slings were an unimaginably tight squeeze to fit into. Ross had given up on track altogether when he realized the petite nylon shorts simply couldn't withstand the gyrating that his thick globes produced.

Ross had become resitant to the routine of getting ready, and the somewhat annoying hassle that came when it was time to put on his boxers. Nevertheless he managed to pull them up without much difficulty, but like always the garment felt noticeably tight around his butt. the real surprising challenge came when it was time to put on his shorts. it didn't make alot of sense because his shorts were always really saggy and large, but somehow, even when he wore them low, they always seemed to tug at his butt. After a few minutes of work, jumping about with extremly silly effort, the shorts snuggly came on and Ross triumphantly went downstairs to get some breakfast before heading off to school. When he got downstairs his mom was at the dinner table reading the newspaper and having a cup of coffee. "Hey mom," he said as he rummaged through the fridge.

"hey honey, ready for your last year of school?" she said, trying not to sound too proud.

"Oh yeah, finally the day has come." Ross lightly laughed. He made himself some cereal and snacked on a banana, but after he was done eating he couldn't help but still feel a little empty. He figured that maybe the butterflies from going back to school might have amped up his apetite so just to make sure he grabbed the pancake mixture and made some pancakes to grubb on (4 fluffy stacked flapjacks to be exact). After he finished his ravenous devour he grabbed his back pack and his keys and headed rushed off to begin his first last day of highschool.

to let you know, Ross has aubrey colored hair and a olive tan complextion. he has somewhat definition of abs and has some ripped muscles.

so what happens next?
1.title: The Beggining

11.content:
Ross entered the schools main doors with a big grin, to most the first day of school was terror, or school in general was terror; but not to Ross, today was the day that he came back to life! the summer had left him a little rusty, with all the party's and what not, but now he was back with a new atitude (and unbenonced to him, a new waistline). "Jonsey!" Ross yelled as he saw his bestfriend at his locker. Jonsey turned sharply to see Ross and he grinned.

"Hey Ross, what's up? ready for the first day of school, cuz i'm sure not." Jonsey laughed and continued shoving his school materials into his locker.

"I feel so energized, i can't wait to see everyone again, and not to mention football tryouts of course." Ross gave Jonsey a playful punch to the arm.

"Oh yeah, i almost forgot all about that, man this years going to be great now that were seniors!"

"I know, i can't believe it. Coach is gunna be on our asses all season to be the best this year i already know that."

"Dude, i don't think anyone can get on your ass, that thing is huge!" Jonsey laughed.

"Hahaha, very funny, you know what i meant."

"Yeah but you'r right, prctice next week is going to be brutal,"
11.title: Ross gets to school and meets with his friends

12.content:
The first few hours of school were already off to a great start, and surprisingly Ross couldn't wait till lunch came around. he sat at his desk thumping his foot impatiently trying to keep his mind off of food so that his stomach wouldn't rumble. Jonsey, Ross's best friend noticed Ross's weird behavior and asked what was wrong. "Dude, are you okay?"

"Oh, yeah, im fine, just bored...i guess." Jonsey stared at him before leaving him alone. "Come on, come on, come on..." Ross whispered staring at the clock. half a minute to go and then he could go to the cafetieria and get something to eat, like pizza, or a taco, or something deep fried and tasty. Ross became aware of the fact that he was drooling and quickly snapped back to reality. RING!!!!! the time had come and lunch was officially here.

Ross jumped up from his desk, grabbed his stuff and jetted out of the room and to his locker as fast as he could. when he got to his locker he jammed his stuff inside and practicly ran to the cafeteria. he scanned the signs and read them off carefully trying to see what food was served up today. salad? what the keck where they trying to serve him? then he saw it, today was basco sticks, pizza, and spaghetti. "oh thank you," Ross muttered to himself before rushing to the line and grabbing two basco sticks, a large side of spaghetti, and two slices of pizza.

Ross could smell the fresh aromas as he headed to the lunch table where his friends were flooded around. Ross sat down at the table and begun to digg in without even saying a word to any of his friends. "Dang Ross, that's a lot of food," Jonsey said staring at Ross in amazement as Ross stuffed the food into his mouth.

"Yeah, i guess" Ross was able to blurt out in between bites. by the time he was done most of his friends had left the lunch table and went to go flirt with some girls or hang out somewhere else. Ross stood up and stretched, he was actually only half way full, but for now it would do.
12.title: later and lunch

choices: his friends ask him about it
122.content: Already a week had went by and Ross was loving it. he hung out with his friends everyday, his classes were actually enjoyable, and food was never far away. Ross had no idea why, but for some reason Ross was always thinking about food recently, he had dreams about food and it was getting to the point to where he had to pack 5 granola bars in his back pack so that he could have one every class or so, so that he could keep focused on his classes. Ross didn't really notice it much or really care, but Jonsey noticed Ross's sudden interest in food, and a few of Ross's other friends noticed too. Brady, Ross's second best friend noticed the interest when he saw Ross shoveling three bags of cheetos into his backpack at the vending machine. overall Ross maintained his grades and who cared if he ate a bit more than usual right?
122.title: week later

1221.content:
no one seemed to comment on Ross's eating habits, but his eating habits where certainly making coments on him. the weight gain came slowly at first, but once another week went by of Ross's indulgences and his intake went up the weight started to make its way into its place and it started to become noticeable, or at least to everyone else. Ross, himself remained oblivious.

Ding!! Ross's alarm clock rung in the morning and Ross lumbered out of bed. "Uh," he murmured to himself as he headed to his closet. he didn't really care what he wore today so he picked out the first thing in his closet and started throwing it on. he had picked out a grey-v-collar-t-shirt, and a pair of red, basketball shorts. He started getting dressed and didn't notice the slight difficulties since he was used to struggleing to get his shorts on. but this time it was alot different, from the slight weight gain some of his weight must have went to his butt because it was a little larger than before, and his shirt was a little snugg around his stomach, but Ross took no notice.
1221.title: the weight gain

12211.content:
a month had gone by already and Ross was exited by the fact that football was going to be coming up soon. little did he notice the change in his body. none of his friends said anything although they seemed to be aware of the weight gain. none of them realized just how much of a gain Ross had until the thursday of that week. Ross came to school in a plain white t-shirt and some green basketball shorts (thursdays where always his lazy days). Ross was in science with Jonsey when Jonsey started seeing the change in Ross. Jonsey and Ross where always bestfriends since middleschool, but Jonsey had to admit that he was always a bit jealous of Ross. growing up Ross was always the best, not to say that Jonsey was lame or ugly, but it was hard to be impressive when you're standing next to Ross. Ross was the rockstar in sports and he had charm with the chicas. Jonsey was always the wingman, but lately he noticed Ross was more into the chicken wings.

The science class met outside today because they were experimenting the affects of the sun. Well, after a few minutes of standing in the sun listening to Mrs. Yeilds, the sun started to get to you. 12 minutes in and the class was laying on the ground trying not to sweat to death. once the class had finished their assingment they had free time to themselfs. the guys decided to play a game of football to keep them energized. Ross, being the all-star sportsman, and mister popular joined in the game and took lead as one of the captains. While playing Jonsey noticed Ross's huffing and puffing as they ran around tackling each other and scoring goals. Jonsey didn't think much of it unitl he went in for a tackle and successfully took Ross down.

Jonsey saw Ross fall to the ground and as he did his shirt lifted up a good centimeter above his navil. Jonsey was sure no one else saw, but he saw all to well Ross's stomach. there was a tiny happy trail that could be seen, but barely. and then Jonsey noticed that there was no sign of abs at all on Ross. Ross's tan stomach puffed out a bit and it rolled up as he menuverd to get up. Thats when Jonsey saw the biggest effect on Ross. his butt had, unbelieveably gotten bigger. Jonsey had noticed a long time ago that Ross had a big rump, but this, this was just plain ridiculous. the weight gain had added extra padding to his butt, and he noticed it was more rounder, and jiggly, it was firm but meaty, and it shook with just the slightest step. Jonsey had no idea how Ross was fitting into his shorts with a butt that big; he noted that the jawstrings pressed tightly into Ross's butt and the material was stressed out tightly.

Brady too noticed Ross's weight gain, it was after school. all the football players had a short meeting today on what they could expect the rest of the season to be like. Brady was in the locker room changing when Ross came in and started changing himself. Brady, unlike his friends, had a weird attraction to men, although he knew he wasn't gay. he couldn't help but watch Ross as he peeled of his clothing. first the shirt came off, revealing a firm layer of pudgy fat that shoved it's way at least two inches over his waistband. and once the shirt was off Brady got a good look at Ross's growing butt. it was juicy and raw, and it pounded as Ross jumped up and down as he tried to balance himself, trying to get his shoes on. it was weird seeing Ross, one of the fittest guys in school, now a pudgy, tubby guy, but it was also really hot, brady noted.
12211.title: the gain continues

122111.content:
Hanging around Ross so much probably wasn't the best idea, because soon Ross's bad habits started to catch on. Ross, of course was the most popular guy in school, so he had lots of friends; and it seemed the more his friends hung around Ross, the more they eat with him. soon, without notice, some of his friends were also eating as badly as him, and with the food came the weight gain.

Brady was the first, Brady, standing at 6,1 ft, would mostlikely not gain weight easily becasue of his longer body, but this was not the case. Brady has short light brown hair and green bright eyes mind you. Brady didn't notice the weight gain, but it certainly showed. Jonsey, yet again noticed the developing of a thicker chin on Brady. along with the growing belly that would press up against his shirts once in awhile.

Jonsey, never thinking twice, also picked up on the habit and started gaining weight. Jonsey has dark black hair, and a mexican tan. Jonsey out of all the friends gained the most without a thought. it started with his abs, they faded and then fat replaced them. his but balloned up, nothing to the size of Ross's but bigger than it had been. it seemed as if all of Ross's friends gained weight as the season progressed. but Coach Waymer wasn't going to have it. Football was starting this week and he saw the changes in his players. Justin, Tyler, Mark, Brady, Darren, Jonsey, Geoff, even his star player Ross, they all started to develop paunchs and guts and big butts. with the exception of Ross who had always had a big butt. He had to do soemthing to get his team back in shape.
122111.title: Ross's habits catch on

1221111.content: "ok boys, practice has finally here and i expect that u guys do youre best and work yuor hardest, and from what ive seen in the hallways, you guys have been slacking." coach was walking down the line of seniors and he slapped Jonseys stomach when he finished his words, clearly sayin that jonsey was one of the slackers. Coach stopped walking down the line and examined his players, only some of them actually looked good in their uniforms, all the others looked like a pig wrapped in a blanket. "any questions?" the line stood still. "ok then lets get to work, and suck in that gut jonsey."
1221111.title: work them hard at practice

choices: the team seems to lose weight but Ross stays the same
12211111.content:
As the season started so did the struggles. Practice soon became brutal, and all the guys were sick and tired of all the tiring practices. Their first game was a total crap fest, as the final score came to Home=12 to opponent=23. Coach was less to say thrilled; he didn't know what to do, all the workouts seemed to have little effect on the boys growing guts and drilling them at practice only made them more lazy during games. He was ready to give up until a thought came to mind. Maybe if he could get the trouble maker or the starter of all this weight gain, maybe, just maybe he could get this problem under control.

So coach did some investigating, using endless hours of school videos in order to find the first person who first started gaining weight. Finally coach found the starter, and boy was he surprised; his star, his personal favorite Ross, was the first to gain weight! this came as a total shock, but eitheir way coach was going to do what he had to do.

Ross was walking down to the football field, he was already wondering about what deadly practice they were going to have today when he herd someone calling his name. "Ross!" He turned around to see Coach waving him over. oh great, Ross thought, what does he want, is he gunna yell at me for my lack of effort? Ross walked to the coach nervously.

"Hey Ross, can i talk to you for a minute?" Coach watched as Ross walked closer, His uniform clung tightly to his gut and coach saw that Ross's face had filled out a bit, it was weird seeing Ross plumped up. He had never thought that his star player would let himself go.

"Yeah coach?" Ross came to a halt infront of him and his stomach gave a jiggle.

"Well Ross, i was just wanted to ask you a little favor."

"Yeah?"

"Well, i've noticed that you and a couple of the team members have been slacking off lately, and you're the leader of this squad. so i'm asking you to show some more enthusiasm and show interest so that the rest of the members will be a little more hard-working."

"Oh...uh, yeah, sure thing." Coach couldn't break his star like he would any other member, it just wasn't in him to yell at his favorite.

"Ok, that's it, now go on, tell the guys that were doing five laps around the track and them going to the weight room for the rest of the day, sorta give you a break, i know it's been kinda rough lately. tell the guys to get changed into some gym clothes today too."

Ross nodded and then ran to tell the guys the new information. Or at least he tried to run, it looked like he was fast walking except he was bouncing up and down. It was painful to see Ross so pudgy, his enormous butt flopped up and down like jello and his belly pumped up and down with every shaking step.
12211111.title: The season starts

choices: take them on a football camp trip instead of dinner night
122111111.content: as the season progressed, the guys didn't seem to lose any weight. In fact, some of them seemed to pork up even more. the uniforms got tighter and the lazy attitude got even lazier, Coach would usually bring in food for a dinner night around this time, but he was afriad to have the dinner night beacuse it might encourage the boys to eat even more than they did now. everything was so confusing, he had never had to deal with his players gaining weight before, but he definately had to deal with it now.
122111111.title: the players still slack off

1221111112.content:
"Okay guys, now i know you've been looking foward to dinner night, but this year i've decided to do something different," Coach was building up to something great, Ross could tell. he had called all the football guys into the gym for this meeting and when word got around that Coach was doing something different for Dinner night the guys thought of anything that he could do. Coach was a great party person, they had learned that from the previous dinner nights they'd been to. "This year, i've decided where going out to Camp Typhoon for an old fashioned football camping expereince. All the guys excited faces semmed to dull down, what was this? Football camp? that wasn't fun, that was work.

"Nice joke coach! you had me for a sec." Matt Bommer spoke out of the players.

"It's not a joke Matt," Coach's face showed no lies and the group got quiet again. "Look you guys, this is your senior year, and so far, it's sucked. we need to get back into the game to make this year the best and most memorable year of your highschool days," all this tough work would certainly be memorable Ross thought to himself. "So, on thursday were heading out to Camp and we'll return on sunday, anyone who doesn't show can consider themselfs off the team."
1221111112.title: take them on a football camp trip instead of di...

choices: go home and pull out the scale
forget about it, go get something to eat
122111112.content:
After awhile, most of the team started to slim down, and the coach couldn't have been more relieved. However he was afraid that the weight might pile back on after awhile, and he was most worried because Ross looked as if he hadn't lost a pound. Coach had no idea what to do, what was a lean team if his most important player was plump and lazy? He had no other chice but to confront Ross again.

"Hey coach, whassup?" Ross was walking out of the locker room after practice. Ross was wearing a tight grey tank top and red shorts. Ross's newly gained gut was clear in sight underneath his shirt and his shorts looked stressed out to where they looked uncomfortable.

"Hey Ross...oh, can i talk to you for a sec?"

"Yeah, sure thing."

"Okay, well i was just...it's hard to say...but, Ross you need to shape up, if you don't im going to have to cut you out of the team."

"What? coach what do you mean? i...i know i haven't been giving it my all, but come on, it's senior year, coach please don't cut me, why?"

"Ross, it's you weight gain, ever since you started putting on weight you've gotten lazy." Ross gave coach a blank stare.

"My...weight gain?" This was clearly hard for coach to say to Ross.

"Ross, you've put on weight, your getting...chubby."

"What?"

"You lost your abs and replaced them by fat, and your butt's gotten huge."

"I...i'm gunna go, i'll talk to you later coach." Ross tried to walk away fastly but he got embarresed when he realised his cheeks were rubbing together, causing them to shake wildly. Had he really let himself go? was coach right? Ross had to investigate some more.
122111112.title: the team seems to lose weight but Ross stays th...

1221111121.content:
Ross was finally shamed out of his denial. He knew that his clothes were fitting tight, heck his mother had bought a new wardrobe. He'd rationalized that he was just having a growth spurt although he was still the same six feet he'd been since freshman year. Was he really getting fat?
Back at home he striped down to his boxers and pulled out the bathroom scale. He'd played at a nice 175 last year after working out to build some muscle. He really hadn't wanted to get any bigger so no more weight training. No reason he should be any heavier.
He stepped on the scale and looked over the bulge around his waist to see the numbers.
159..165.....170... finally the dial stopped and Ross read
1221111121.title: go home and pull out the scale

12211111211.content:
"190, I guess I am fat." Ross admitted then stood by the mirror to take a better look. There was a pronounced bulge to his belly and some soft fleshy folds on the sides that might be lovehandles. Even his face had a rounder softer look. "More mature." Ross told himself. "Actually not too bad."
"I can handle this two ways," Ross decided. I can keep the weight and get back to the workouts to firm it up or I can diet back to my old weight.
what should he do?

12211112.content:
The season had officially started and this year was going to be harder than any other. The gang had no idea why the coach was being so no-nonsense at practice; but it was beginning to get on their nerves. Not to mention that each practice was now extended another half hour. The coach also mentioned that if they wanted to do well then they'd all have to go on strict diets, no one knew why, but they had no choice to follow it.

At the same time, they couldn't just sit there and eat nothing. Ross's cravings were getting even worse and Coach's diet cut out all the things he loved to eat. No fast food, desserts, barely any carbs, just the basic food groups in there plain boring and dull ways. The diet and practices went into affect two days ago and Ross hated it. This was the worst time he could ever imagine having. Life was extremely dull and difficult. Not to mention that the coach had talked to all their parents about the practice and diet so there was no slacking at home either; no time to pig out or eat what he wanted to, he was forced to eat just as healthy at home as he did at school. Ross had, had enough; he decided to hold a meeting in the cafeteria the next day with all the football players to discuss what to do about all of this.

"Okay you guys, i've called you all here to talk about our current situation." Ross was huddled around the entire football team; they had snuck in after school for this ergent meeting.

"What situation?" Jonsey asked arrogantly.

"The diet and practice situation; i don't know about you guys, but this diet thing is ridiculous. Were seniors! were going to be going to college next year, we can't be treated like little kids anymore, we decide what we do, not our parents. Our parents will have no say over us next year, were going to be out on our own and they need to realize that."

"Well, i agree, sorta, but...i dont know about rebelling against them, they're our parents after all, they want whats best for us." Brady said.

"Well you can do what you want momma's boy, but i say we brake some rules." They all laughed, even Brady.

"Well what do you suggest we do about this situation Ross?" Jonsey said sarcasticly. Ross looked at him with a smile and then went on with the fake dramatic moment.

"Gentlemen! we have a serious issue on our hands! we are being told that we cannot eat what we want to, what we need to! we need to take action, but use stealth." Ross laughed. "I say we need a hideout soemwhere, where we can stash all the food we want to eat and then eat it there; that way we don't have to upset our parents, or the coach." They all looked around at each other, it seemed a little kid-ish, but hey, a guy's gotta do what a guys gotta do. Ross jumped on the cafeteria table they were gathered around and pumped his fist in the air. "Are you with me!?" He yelled.

"YES!" they all yelled and joined in cheers. this was a fool proof plan.

They plotted out all the details and came up with the perfect safe place; they had three spots were they would stash the food. For school they would stash the food in the equipment room. when they were at home they would stash food at the restuarant Champs that Nathan worked at that was close enough for them all to go to. And the third was at the woods that they all used to hang out in when they were in middle school
12211112.title: The gang secretly sneaks food

choices: Jon talks to his chemistry friends.
Jon gets the cheerleaders to help fatten up the team
122111122.content:
Let did they know that outside the cafeteria was Jon Waymer who was the water boy and coach's son. He don't have a good build like all the football players and most of the bullies picked on him and Ross and the football team did stand up for him in a some fights. He ran to his dad in his office and told him of their plans.

"So they want to be big. I will make them big beyond their dreams" said an angry Coach Waymer.
"Dad please don't hurt them they stopped Tom park picking on me" pleaded Jon with a sad face on.
There was one thing in the world he cared about, it was his son as he was grateful that he was not picked on most of the time.
"Okay how about this can you and your chemistry friends produce a gainer powder and while the team becomes big we pushed them to have both muscle and fat" said Coach Waymer.
"Okay" said Jon as he got a brain instead of muscles and say that the outcome as a team of power tanks.
"Let's go home" said Coach Waymer as he hugged his son and turned off the office light and locked up and walked towards his car.
122111122.title: Coach finds out

1221112.content:
Coach Waymer put some thought into whipping his players back into shape, but soon came to the realization that those guys weren't boys anymore. They were men, and all men put at least a few pounds--why try to fight nature? His players were naturally getting a little rounder in the middle, so he decided to let his players decide for themselves how they wanted there bodies to look--it shouldn't concern him.

The next day though, Coach realized that it may have had more of an effect than he anticipated. He had planned out an easy practice just to get his players back into the groove of things: 2 laps around the track, stretching, pushups, and a half hour of drills. As some players started trotting out of the locker room and onto the field, he could already see a change in lots of the seniors--they were lazy jogging out, and clearly filled out their uniforms more tightly. Then he saw his star player, Ross, lazily trot out of the locker room. He couldn't get a good view of Ross's stomach since his shoulder pads were on, but he had clearly let himself go at least a little. His massive butt jiggled on top of his meaty thighs, straining his tights to a point where they were nearly see-through. After the 2 warmup laps, Ross approached Coach Waymer, huffing, puffing and drenched in sweat.

"Coach, I.....don't......feel........so.......great." Ross managed to say, through his intense breathing. Ross bent over, attempting to catch his breath. "This padding's so heavy, it's making it really hard to run."

"It's ok Ross," Coach Waymer remembered he told himself not to fight nature, and so was very understanding. "Why don't you stretch some and then go home--I can't risk anything happening to my star player."

"Thanks alot Coach." Ross pulled up his jersey to wipe the sweat off his face, giving coach a clear view at what used to be Ross's six pack. Now, it had turned into a rounded, albeit small, jiggling sign of his overindulgence. turning around to walk back towards the locker room, Ross's titanic butt cheeks jiggled with every slow, pounding step he took.
1221112.title: let nature run it's course

12211121.content:
Ross dragged himself back into the locker room, only to find Jonsey still sitting on a bench, half-dressed in only his tights. Ross's eyes were immediately dragged to his midsection, with 3 litle rolls sitting on top of his tights, right where his chiseled abs had been. Ross had no idea why Jonsey was here, or how he had managed to chub himself up, and so asked him. It turns out Jonsey was trying to avoid practicing, as he knew he was far too out of shape to handle it. Looking at Jonsey's gut as he stood up and then seeing his ass bulging through the back of his tights, Ross couldn't help but agree.

Ross suggested to Jonsey that they change and go grab a bite to eat, and Jonsey couldn't have agreed more. Both guys, eagerly anticipating a chance to fill themselves up, hurriedly stripped out of their uniforms. As they pulled their tights off, Ross got a good look at Jonsey's bare, pale ass. Compared to the last time he noticed it, it had really filled out. Set ontop of a new pair of beefier thighs, Ross saw that his gut wasn't the only part of him that fattened up. Not that Ross was in a better spot--he had done his fair share of overindulging, and it showed all over his body. Once back into their normal clothes, which didn't make them appear much thinner, Ross and Jonsey left in Ross's car, unsure of their destination--although their little guts, jiggling and growling with every bump in the road, knew exactly what they wanted.
12211121.title: changing out of his uniform

choices: Candy notice and comes back with twice as much.
Ross go and get more snacks.
12212.content:
Later when he asked out Candy Brown the student body president. Candy Brown had blonde hair and blue eyes and was busty. They went to a movie about some chick flick. Ross ordered jumbo popcorn, a large hot dog and a huge milkshake. Candy just had a small diet soda.

"That's a lot of food. What are you going to do hibernate for the winter?" asked Candy as she smiled and pointed towards the food.
"Hey coach wants me to bulk up and the movie is like three hours long." said Ross hugging Candy.
As they sat down Ross had to go the restroom and while he started to walk away. Candy saw his butt and it looked bigger. Thoughts were crawling in her head. She was a chubby chaser and she know a recipe on how make boyfriends her loyal toys. "He butt looks bigger and maybe the bigger it gets the more I can pinch" thought Candy.
"Hey" said a voice. It startled Candy and saw it Ross who came back. The lights dimmed and the movie started and with Ross putting his hand around Candy and her snuggling against his chest. She notice his small belly and wants it bigger. She secretly loved his butt and belly and would feed him till sumos would be jealous of his size.

Half way through the movie Ross ate and drank all his food and was still hungry.
12212.title: a hot date

122121.content:
"Be right back." Candy gave Ross's thigh a pat and slipped out of her seat. Ross was surprised but figured she just had to visit the ladies room - or maybe he wasn't paying enough attention to her. Candy wasn't his usual type. She was more of the take charge kind of girl. Ross was surprised that she agreed to the movie but he was sick of those clingy, mindless sorority types. Maybe he bored her or maybe she was expecting more action from a jock. Thinking wore Ross out so it wasn't long before the movie grabbed his attention back. It was all good. There were plenty of chicks that would be eager to spend time with Ross.
"Didn't want you to starve, Ross and I was afraid you'd be too polite to leave me here so I got you a little something. Hope I read your mind."
Candy had brought Ross a couple of hot dogs, another big tub of popcorn, heavy on the butter and she had stocked a few candy bars in hre purse in case he big jock wanted more.
"UMM, thanks!" All Ross could think was that Candy was a keeper.
Candy was thinking the same about Ross. He had the same dumb grateful look that her German shepherd gave her at feeding time. This guy was perfect. A jock, not too bright. She would have him eating out of her hand in no time.
Ross ate the dogs quickly while Candy held the popcorn. He liked her. She was smart, had big boobs and she was a mind reader. Cautiously, he draped a meaty arm around her shoulder and pulled her close. She didn't resist and even moved over closer while he explored her acceptance of more intimacy. He really wanted to fondle those big babies in the darkness of the theater.but would she welcome that or not. She seemed happy snuggling with him and she cared enough to bring him food. He wouldn't have given it a second thought with those sonority chicks but Candy was special. Maybe she wouldn't fall into his arms. Maybe she wanted more time to get to know him first. This was a new dilemma for Ross for whom chicks were a disposable item, easily replaced. He didn't want to screw this up. should he fondle her breast or should he play it cool with just a snuggle.
122121.title: Candy notice and comes back with twice as much.

1221211.content:
Ross had maneuvered one arem around Candy's shoulder with his hand just resting. Candy held the popcorn so that Ross could shovel big handfuls of butter soaked kernels into his mouth. When it was gone, she wondered if the big guy would make a move. She had watched him. The poor boy couldn't keep his eyes off her boobs. She knew what he wanted. The movie was in between action scenes. It was the perfect time for Ross to make his move. But maybe she would have to help him out.
"Let's get rid of this." Candy reached across Ross to put the empty popcorn tub on a vacant seat leaning into Ross and making sure that her breasts were against his chest. Instinctively, Ross pulled her closed somehow managing to get his hands on each one.
Do they kiss?
1221211.title: Go for the breast

choices: Candy invites him to her place
Ross takes her home to his place
12212112.content:
Ross had one hand on each breast, looking into Candy's eyes. It was everything he could have wanted. He leaned his head forward for a kiss when Candy stopped him.
"Hold on there, big boy." She knew that the best way to keep a boy eating out of her hand was to pull away just when he though he was winning.
"What kind of girl do you think I am?"
Ross pulled back his hands. Had he gone too far? The just wanted to keep fondling those beautiful big breasts. Then he felt Candy's hand on his thigh. It was warm and soothing.
Candy smiled and handed him a candy bar.
"I like your idea but now is not the time or the place."
Ross was so excited that he couldn't follow the rest of the movie. All he could think about was that Candy wanted him. He held her hand and dreamed about when that time might be.
After the moive
12212112.title: No

choices: Ross wakes up at home in his own bed.
122121121.content:
Candy decides that Ross just might be a keeper. He's good looking, not too bright and seems to like eating. She hasn't yet found all those positives in a man. Now to put him to the test. She can see that he is likes her attributes. She has already got him eating almost literally out of her hand.
"Come on up for a minute." Candy offerred Ross as he walked her to the door of her apartment. Ross was prepared to settle for a kiss but he quickly said 'Sure' and followed Candy inside admiring the gentle sway of her well endowed ass. "Man, does she have a nice ass." he thought to himself.
Candy likewise was appreciating the bulge of Ross' belly just beginning to softly overflow his straining jeans.
"Sit down on the couch and get comfortable while I get us a nightcap. Beer or wine for you?"
Candy helped Ross slip off his jacket letting her hands caress his belly. Ross felt a tingle then embarrassment. "Man, I've gotta do something about my gut." he thought.
"Wine." he told her thinking that wine probably had fewer calories than beer. After all, nobody ever talks about a wine belly.

Hungry?" Candy called from the kitchen.
"No, I'm fine." Ross answered quickly. Hot girls like Candy want men with sixpacks not bellies.
Candy returned with a bottle of wine, two glasses and a big wedge of cheese.
"Wine needs some food to appreciate. Try some brie." Candy sliced off a piece of double rich brie and smeared it on a hunk of french bread. Ross had never seen Brie before but if Candy was offering who was he to refuse. Besides he was still hungry, What could it hurt.
They talked. Ross was never much at conversation with the ladies but somehow Candy was different. She slipped out and brought another wedge of brie and a second bottle of wine. Ross didn't notice that he was doing most of the eating and drinking. He forgot his belly which expanded with a third wedge of cheese to finish off the loaf of french bread. Ross felt sophisticated and pleased with himself. He was eating healthy and light, drinking wine and eating cheese rather than beer and pizza and Candy seemed to like him. He was getting mellow. He wondered when would be the right time to make his move on Candy. Clearly she was in to him. He poured the last of the third bottle of wine and watched Candy's beautiful smile and then passed out on the sofa..
122121121.title: Candy invites him to her place

1221211211.content:
Ross woke up to the feeling of light and heat bathing his body. He opened his eyes and got up to stretched. He looked around and noticed that he was not in his room but in another room. He also realized it was the weekend. He racked his mind and remember that he and Candy went back to her place after the movie and had wine and cheese. “I must have passed out.” he thought as she tried to pat down his bedhead hair. He heard noise coming from the kitchen and wondered toward the kitchen. He saw Candy wearing a very loose sport jersey with Ross’s number on it and very tight and short pajama shorts. She was cooking something. She turned around and saw him.

“Hey, You’re up. I making breakfast some pancakes, bacon and scrambled eggs sound okay. “said Candy as she smiled. Ross went felt a stirring downstairs. He quickly composed himself.

“That sound great, um where is the bathroom.” said Ross as he really had to go and also freshen himself up.

“The bathroom is down the hall and first door on your left.” said as she went back to cooking up breakfast. Ross nodded and went to the bathroom. After he did his business and freshened up he pulled up his jacket and shirt and saw that this bloated belly went down. He let out a sigh of relief as he put his jacket and shirt down. What he didn’t see is that his six packs abs lost some definition. He exited the bathroom and went back to the kitchen and saw Candy setting the counter for two. He sat down.

“Hope you like my breakfast. “said Candy. A hidden talent very people now about her is that she is culinary genius as she can make some of the hardest dishes look easy. Due to her talent many culinary colleges are offer her free scholarships when they saw her videotapes on making very difficult food dishes. She huge a huge stack of pancakes with a luge portion of fried bacon and scrambled eggs and huge mug filled with orange juice.

“Expecting an army. “said Ross light heartily as he could no way eat all of the food in front of him.

“No just wanted to use some of ingredients before they go bad.” said Candy, as she just had a bowl of fruit with yogurt and granola.

“So I hear you need a tutor in a few subject “said Candy trying to make a conversation. Soon Ross talked about what classes his failing or just barley passing. Candy noticed that with each explanation he slowly started to eat and was distraction how slowly the food disappeared right into his belly. She saw that his belly started to slowly budge out due to the great amount of food. They next talked about how Candy would tutor him at her apartment as she was the top of all the class she has as several of her classes are advance courses. She learned that Ross was hoping for a sport scholarship as he has grades. Candy told him to don’t worry about his grades as her tutoring will make his grades will rise. Their conversation went for over an hour and by the time their conversation was done. Ross had eaten all of the food placed in front of him and his belly looked just as round as the night before.

“Thanks for listening to me and for the future tutoring. “said Ross as he yawned as he got up and felt a bit tired. He didn’t notice his bloated belly.

“No problem. Anything to help you. “said Candy as she washed the empty dishes. Ross nodded and went to couch and fell down on it and soon went to take a nap to disgust all the food he has eaten. Candy soon hear snoring coming from the couch and just smiled.
1221211211.title: Next morning.

1222.content:
Jonsey, being the good friend he was, was worried about Ross's weird habits lately. he decided the next time he saw him he would ask about what was going. So the next day at school Jonsey walked over to Ross while he was standing at the vending machine trying to get a snickers bar. "Hey, whassup buddy." Jonsey said as he patted him on the back. Ross spun around to see him and smiled.

"Hey Jonsey, ready for that brutal test today in math?" Jonsey laughed.

"Hah, yeah...but i have something to ask you." Jonsey looked serious and Ross wondered what he was talking about.

"Well..what is it?"

"Well...i was just wondering...what's up with you and food lately?"

"Wha, what do you mean?"

"Dude you're eating all the time, its like all that's ever on your mind is food."

"Dude, what are you talking about? i'm fine. thanks for worrying...i guess, but really im fine." Jonsey wanted to argue, but Ross was his best friend and if he said he was fine, then he had to let it go. but that didn't mean he wasn't suspisciosus
1222.title: his friends ask him about it

choices: Ross headed to get more food
when they get to cedar point
12221.content:
A few weeks later the gang decided to take a trip to cedar point before football season started. It was going to be a great time, Ross, Jonsey, Brady, Shaun, and Mark couldnt wait to get there; but it was going to take awhile. the gang decided to drive there in Mark's car. Mark was the nice guy of the crowd, he was average height with a tiny goatee and mild afro. He along with the others were part of the football team. They set off for the trip on thursday, packing up and hitting the road. Most of the day was spent in the cramped truck. Mark drove and Jonsey sat shotgun reading off directions. Brady sat behind Mark and jammed to his ipod with Shaun, and then Ross, Ross sat behind Jonsey munching away on assorted foods.

Jonsey checked the rear veiw mirrior at various times, only to see Ross stuffing his face non stop. This was the type of weird behavior Jonsey had been talking about; what was up with Ross lately? eventually when they hit Illinois at night they stopped at a gas station to fill up gas and hit the restrooms. Mark took in a deep breath, "Man, that's alot of driving man, and where almost there thank god." he chuckled as did Jonsey.

"I know, man tomorrow's going to be awesome, that is if these guys ever wake up," He looked at the back seat to see all three guys sleeping. "Hey! wake up guys!" he slapped their knees and they all slowly woke up.

"Are we there already?" Shaun asked.

"Almost, no thanks to you guys," Martin laughed as he exited the car. The rest of the guys got out of the car as well and then...
12221.title: at the trip to....

122211.content:
"Oh gas station! alright, time for some grub!" Ross said as he exited.

"Really? You've been eating this whole ride, aren't you full yet?" Ross stopped walking at looked back at Mark.

"Dude, live a little, eating on a roadtrip is one of the most entertaining parts!" He exclaimed as he walked into the tiny little shop. Mark looked at Jonsey, but Jonsey just gave a shrug.

They all gathered up in the store and picked out assorted drinks and chips and foods that would hold them off till thye got to their destination.

"Get enough food Ross? we only have a nights drive left!"

"Hey the more the better man! it's not like you paid for it anyway!" Ross said, opening a new bag of combos.

"I'll agree to that! hey man pass some of that over here!" Brady said.

"Let me have some after you're done," Shaun said. "Might as well."

"It's going to be a long night," Mark said, eyes closely on the road. Jonsey nodded in compliance.
122211.title: Ross headed to get more food

choices: Brady had talked Mark into cutting through the woods
Brady and Mark had broken into a cabin and were sleeping
1222111.content:
The clerk in the shop picker up his cell phone and dialed.
"Some kids just left headed for the lake. Might be some weekend fun."
"Man!" Mark was driving as he saw the big arrow and the detour sign blocking the road. The other guys were asleep. Mark turned into the narrow side road and drove on.

"We here?" Shaun woke as Mark pulled to a stop. The road had almost disappeared in the hour since the detour sign. Mark was beginning to worry. He didn't know if the road was wide enough to turn around.
"I think we're lost." he said.
The other boys climbed out of the car and looked around. There was nothing but trees all around them.
"You boys lost?" came a voice back in the woods.
Mark looked over to see two strapping men break through the forest.
"This detour seems to be a dead end." Mark began. He was relieved to have company and these two men looked like they knew their way around the woods.
The first guy smiled showing ragged teeth. He was a big guy, strong but with a big gut as well bulging out of a flannel shirt that couldn't hope to button around it.
"The county road crew up here don't amount to much. They probably forgot to mark the turnoff. You boys out for a wild weekend on your own?"
Up close the smile didn't make him look friendly.
"Yes sir." Mark responded politely. The second guy wasn't smiling at all. He was even bigger than the first and the scar on his cheek made him look fierce.
"Maybe we can give you a hand and get you on your way," the second guy said.
All four boys were now out of the car.
"Give me the keys and I'll get you back on your way." The smaller guy took the keys from Mark and squeezed in. "Stand back with Jethro while I get this turned around.
With some anxiety the boys moved over to the side of the road near the bigger uglier woodsman who watched them with a scowl.
Carefully he maneuvered the car back and forth until finally it was turned around. Meanwhile big Jethro was not on the other side of the road and when the car stopped, he crammed his bulk inside.
"So long boys. You've got about 10 miles back to the nearest phone. Hope that's wild enough for you."
They watched the cloud of dust settle.
"Now what?" Shaun said trying to get a signal on his cellphone.
"We walk." Mark said.
"Wait a minute. He said it was ten miles. I can't do ten miles. Shaun is the long distance runner. Let him go and send someone back to get us." Ross was adamant. "I'm waiting right here while you hotshots go.
Finally Mark and Shaun set out for help while Brady stayed with Ross. Four hours later the rescue party had called in the Sheriff to rescue Brady and Ross but when they got to the end of the road both boys were gone. They searched for hours with no luck. Where had they gone?
1222111.title: Detour

choices: Their new life- one week later.
12221111.content:
Ross and Brady woke to be sitting in rocking chairs on the porch of a cabin. They were dressed in worn bib overalls and shoeless. Neither could move except a facial twitching and a palsied clenching of their fists.
Ross was drooling while Brady just stared into space.

"Yessir, officers. may boys done left me for the big city. After all I done for them, they just up and left their poor ole maw all alone. Jethro and Cletus always was worthless. Won't make much difference. These boys here are my sister Jessie's boys, Festus and Rufus. They ain't too bright. Festus got kicked in the head by a mule and Rufus got that thing where letter go all crazy on you. Can't read so told here I'd take care of them so long as they help me around the place. They like it here pretty good. Don't you boys?"
Ross tried to cry for help but it just made him drool even more and look even crazier. Brady was able to get our a word or two but they didn't make much sense. He was trying to ask for help but it just sounded like a moan.
"I know you're happy Rufus. Don't fret."
"OK Daisy. We may need to talk to your boys about a car jacking but meanwhile, if you see or hear anything about two boys gone missing just let us know."
Ross and Brady moaned as they watched the officers hike back up the train. They never should have tried a shortcut out of the woods and even more they never should have knocked on the door of the cabin and finally, no matter how hungry they were, they never should have stayed for dinner.
The officer in charge shrugged his head as they hiked back to their car.
"Those inbred hillbillies!" he muttered to his partner. "It's a wonder they can still function."
Daisy watched the officer and then turned to the boys.
"You boys are the answer to my prayers." she told them. "My two worthless sons just left me. You two look strong enough to keep things running out here. Soon as that dandelion potion gets fully working you won't remember much about who you are. Festus looks like the stronger of the two so you can be my outside man. I need lots of wood chopped for the winter, the roof needs mending to get you started. Rufus, you can help me in the house with the cooking, cleaning and tending the garden. Now drink down this potion."
Daisy forced a large dose of dandelion potion down the throats of each boy and soon they were unconscious. Daisy spent a few minutes with each reinforcing her story about who they were. They would sleep for several hours and awake ready for their new lives... and dinner.
12221111.title: Brady had talked Ross into cutting through the ...

122211112.content:
"Eat up boys." Daisy had finally worked her new captives into a routine. The dandelion elixir took a while for full impact but they no longer had any memory of life before Daisy or that their names were Ross and Brady and not Cletus and Rufus. They were dumber too, thanks to the elixir which dropped them about 30 points in intelligence. Daisy didn;t need them smart . Brady/Rufus was accustomed to laboring all day around Daisy's place, chopping wood, hauling rocks, mending fences and whatnot. Ross/Cletus was helping with the garden, the house and cooking. The boys were now accustomed to real southern style cooking, high on the carbs and fat and light on protein, Cletus was learning to cook beans with fatback, biscuits and gravy and chicken stew.
Daisy smiled. These two were working out much better than her own worthless sons.
They were eating like country boys now, not like picky city boys, slopping up the sauces with hunks of corn bread and always ready for more. That was another effect of the elixir and the final effect was just beginning to show. The boys were
122211112.title: Their new life- one week later.

1222111121.content:
Rufus brushed his thick curls away from his face and tied them up in a bandanna. Daisy hadn't provided any shaving implements for the boys and he was now sporting a bushy beard as well as a thicker pelt of hair on his chest. Cletus was growing hair also. His dirty brown hair was thicker, darker and getting frizzy. His beard was coming in red as was the new pelt on his chest. The boys shared an attic room and a double bed.

Their days started with work. Rufus chopped wood for an hour while Cletus cooked up breakfast. Breakfast was hearty, Eggs and country sausage; biscuits and gravy, grits and syrup. Rufus needed a big breakfast but Cletus matched him and then mopped up any leftovers. Both boys were getting bigger in their new life. Rufus grew a broad muscular chest and big arms from his labors while Cletus grew a big soft belly. Daisy couldn't be happier. They were eating her out of supplies but she couldn't argue with their dedication.

"Ma." Both boys called her Ma. "I ripped my pants." Cletus was looking at her with embarrassment.
Daisy sighed. That boy was big as a barn. Still she couldn't complain.
"What happened, boy?" she asked.
"I was bending over to get the biscuits out of the oven and I must have caught them on something." Cletus was standing in his skivvies looking at his pants. The seat had blown out.
"You need to be more careful son. I'm not made of money. I'll have to get you another pair next time I go to town."
"Yes'm. I'm real sorry. I will be more careful."
"My shirt ripped too." Rufus had come in and stood in the kitchen shirtless holding a ripped shirt.
Daisy looked at him with wonder. He had a big chest on him. Almost like some body builder.
"I'll take care of it," Daisy snapped. "Now you two get back to work. Ain't nobody here gonna care about seeing two half-nekkid boys. You'll be fine until I get to the store."
Over the next months, Rufus grows into a muscle monster, he can chop wood forever and life huge rocks into place building walls on the place. Cletus just gets fatter. Sharing a bed in the cold winter helped the boys appreciate each other more. Rufus appreciated the warmth from fat Cletus and Cletus loved to cuddle in Rufus strong arms. One thing led to another and the boys became lovers as well.
Daisy kept them dosed with the elixer but she didn't realize that as the boys grew, she needed more elixer to keep them in their dependent situation. The muscular and active Rufus began to start remembering their old life first. But it only seemed like a dream because it was so outlandish to imagine another life. Gradually he became convinced that he had to try escape. Cletus wouldn't believe but he was so dependent on Rufus that he finally agreed to follow his lead. So the next time Daisy went to town Rufus led Cletus down the trail.
1222111121.title: Getting harier

12221111211.content: The sheriff found Cletus and Rufus wandering aimlessly around town and took them in for questioning. They told him about Daisy and the farm and Rufus mentioned that he remembered somewhere else living in a city building with a bumch of other guys. He checked with Daisy and found her story suspicious. Under pressure, she admitted that she had drgged the boys and kpet them on hre farm. Checking missing persons reports confirmed that they were the missing students and Cletus gradually remembered who they were. Rufus knew that his name ws Brady but the special relationship formed with Cletus was still strong. Fat Ross was still Cletus to muscular Rufus and Brady was Rufus to Cletus.
12221111211.title: And into town

122211112112.content:
Ross and Brady tried to readjust to life in town. Now that the drugs had worn off they remembered town life. Somehow it just didn't feel right. Both boys were so different from their life with Daisy that fitting back in was hard. Ross was too fat to join in with his jock friends and withdrew to the kitchen baking cookies, cakes and pies, baking bread. Brady was such a beefy hulk that he no longer enjoyed the sports either. He dominated every play. Soon they were drawing away from school and social activities and spending all their time togehter as a couple. They didn't even pretend to be straight. Finally Brady decided that Ross and he would be happier living in the woods with Daisy.
"Daisy." The sheriff was stern with the old woman. "I'm going to check in every month to see how these boys are doing. Understand?"
Daisy nodded solumly. She was so happy to have Cletus and Rufus back.
"These boyss are here on their own volition. If I find you drugging them or doing anything that keeps them here by force, you are going to jail."
"It's alright, sheriff." The big bear of a guy, Brady/Rufus growled. He had his arm around the round tub of lard Ross/Cletus and smiled. "Daisy knows that we just want to have our old life back. She's cool with that and there is so much to do around here. Isn't there, Daisy?"
She nodded again, happy to have these boys back to take care of her in her old age.
"Drop by anytime, sheriff." she said as he got into his car. "Cletus makes a mean breakfast."
122211112112.title: Back to Daisy's cabin

info.brief_description: Ross comes face to face with weight gain
info.description:
Ross is the typical school, cool boy jock. This year is Ross's senior year and he's living the big life, literately. join the story as Ross and his friends struggle with the battle of the bulge, are you ready?

-no sudden weight gain
-keep the gay/lesbian to a minimum
-have fun!
